# thecloud_instance (Resource)

Instance resource allows you to manage compute instances.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thecloud_vpc" "main" {
  name = "main-vpc"
}

resource "thecloud_instance" "web" {
  name   = "web-server"
  image  = "ubuntu-22.04"
  vpc_id = thecloud_vpc.main.id
  ports  = "80:80,443:443"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `image` (String) The image to use for the instance.
- `name` (String) The name of the instance.

### Optional

- `ports` (String) The port mappings for the instance (e.g. '80:80,443:443').
- `vpc_id` (String) The ID of the VPC to launch the instance in.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the instance.
- `ip_address` (String) The IP address of the instance.
- `status` (String) The status of the instance.
